title: Doctor Sleep
synopsis: A sequel to *The Shining*, following a now-adult Danny Torrance as he battles addiction and encounters a cult that feeds on psychic energy.

title: Carrie
synopsis: Stephen King's debut novel about a bullied high school girl who discovers her telekinetic powers and exacts revenge on her tormentors.

title: Pet Sematary
synopsis: A horror novel exploring themes of death and resurrection when a man discovers an ancient burial ground with dark powers.
